column1: Master of Psychology: Theory and Research (Leuven)
column3: Faculty of Psychology and Educational Sciences
column5: The research masters programme aims at guiding students to become independent researchers in psychological science. The faculty offers a challenging and dynamic study environment with research-based education delivered in close interaction with internationally renowned researchers.About the programmeThe Master of Psychology: Theory and Research (MPTR) aims to guide students to become independent researchers in psychological science through:
